text: Money in the Bank (2012) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by WWE. It took place on July 15, 2012 at the US Airways Center in Phoenix, Arizona. It was the third Money in the Bank event held by WWE. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Kofi Kingston and R-Truth defeated Hunico and Camacho Tag team match 8:22 2 Dolph Ziggler (with Vickie Guerrero) defeated Damien Sandow, Tyson Kidd, Christian, Santino Marella, Tensai (with Sakamoto), Cody Rhodes, and Sin Cara Money in the Bank ladder match for a World Heavyweight Championship match 18:23 3 Sheamus (c) defeated Alberto Del Rio (with Ricardo Rodriguez) Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 14:25 4 Primo and Epico (with Rosa Mendes) defeated The Prime Time Players (Titus O'Neil and Darren Young) (with A.W.) Tag team match 7:32 5 CM Punk (c) defeated Daniel Bryan No Disqualification match for the WWE Championship with AJ as special guest referee 27:48 6 Ryback defeated Curt Hawkins and Tyler Reks Handicap match 4:21 7 Layla, Kaitlyn and Tamina Snuka defeated Beth Phoenix, Natalya and Eve Torres Six-Diva tag team match 3:19 8 John Cena defeated Kane, Chris Jericho, Big Show, and The Miz Money in the Bank ladder match for a WWE Championship match 20:15 (c) – is the champion(s) going into the match P – This match took place on the pre-show ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Money in the Bank 2012 website Category:2012 in American television Category:2012 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Phoenix, Arizona Category:WWE Money in the Bank Category:2010s in Phoenix Category:July 2012 events
title: Money in the Bank (2012)
